creator: benkstein@math.tu-dresden.de
text:
The document at above URL says:

"The only requirement to do the transformation is a Java 1.2 or greater JVM 
(which can be obtained free from Sun). Assuming you already have httpd-2.
0/docs/manual checked out from CVS, here is what you need to do to build: (If 
you need instructions on setting up anonymous CVS, see this page[1].)"

"this page" is a dead link to [1] http://www.apache.org/foundation/cvs.html and 
should be fixed.

Sorry if this is wrong here, but I didn't know where else I should report it.
